name: WitheredLands
description:
Help guide a lost little soul to escape from a cursed land

WitheredLands is a short - adventure game where you play as a little soul that got lost in an very dark cursed land, your only objective is to escape from the cursed land back to the place that you used to be.

Game By: Grand Cruise Game

Warning:

this game is my first game that i made, please leave a comment if you found any bugs or problems with the game, also thank you for downloading i really appreciate it.
